name: WS Jobvite
author: Ravi Kumar

sections.description:
WS jobvite provides you to easy way to display joblist from jobvite using Jobvite API using shortcode in pages or posts.

Features

  • Shortcode
  • Use Function to get joblist
  • And so more coming soon.
sections.installation:
Follow these steps to install this plugin

you will need to be issued an API key, Secret key and company ID by the Jobvite.

For Keys you can request here
http://recruiting.jobvite.com/support/customer
e.g.

  1. Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
  2. Now click on “Jobvite” menu in left sidebar admin section.
  3. Now show settings page.
  4. Add your Jobvite API KEY.
  5. Add your Jobvite Secret.
  6. Add your Jobvite company ID.
  7. Save.
  8. Add shortcode in page or post.
  9. shortcode should be [ws-jobvite region = “All”] or [ws-jobvite region = “your region name”]
  10. Enjoy it!
sections.faq:
There are no FAQ just yet

Installation Instructions

Follow these steps to install this plugin

you will need to be issued an API key, Secret key and company ID by the Jobvite.

For Keys you can request here
http://recruiting.jobvite.com/support/customer

  2. Now click on “Jobvite” menu in left sidebar admin section.
  3. Now show settings page.
  4. Add your Jobvite API KEY.
  5. Add your Jobvite Secret.
  6. Add your Jobvite company ID.
  7. Save.
  8. Add shortcode in page or post.
  9. shortcode should be [ws-jobvite region = “All”] or [ws-jobvite region = “your region name”]
  10. Enjoy it!
